entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
